author: senh
title: In Transit: Forecasting Your Vacation Weather by Looking at the Past
text: BING NEWS: Forecasting Your Vacation Weather by Looking at the Past Bad weather can often ruin a vacation, but weather forecasts can also be wrong. With these two thoughts in mind, a new service called WeatherPlanner is hoping to give travelers a better sense of when to book their next trip.
